Observed at: Lac La Biche 9:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 13. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
